thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: California laboratory Primex settles U.S. kickback probe

author: Reuters Editorial
title: California laboratory Primex settles U.S. kickback probe
text:
A California-based diagnostic testing company and the owner of a laboratory management company have agreed to pay $3.77 million to resolve claims that they paid kickbacks for patient referrals.
Primex Clinical Laboratories Inc will pay $3.5 million as a part of a settlement announced on Wednesday by U.S. Attorney Erin Nealy Cox in Dallas. DNA Stat Chief Executive Mitch Edland will pay $270,000 to resolve similar allegations, Coxâ€™s office said.
To read the full story on WestlawNext Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2nd2TQq
